title: Reason for sleeping difficulty at night

content.prompt: Why does the recipient of the letter have difficulty sleeping at night?

choices.label: She has too many homework assignments.
She participates in several extracurricular activities.
She is embarrassed by her acne.
She drinks tea too late at night.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
